name: WayHome
description:
A brave little adventurer finds themselves in a dimension they don't recognise. Shoot down the attacking UFOs and take their warp energy, then jet out of there once your warp drive is fully charged. How quickly can you escape?

Controls:
Arrow keys - Move and turn
Circle button (Z) - Shoot
Cross button (X) - Start the game

This is a game jam submission and my first attempt at making a full game with the PICO-8. I overextended again, but I think the game feel is at least alright.

This project uses music made by Gruber: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=29008
